topics.body:
Ok
Quick question 

Wouldn't you want to finish a cage for a murder monster before you put the murder monster in.
Plus I know they were making the cage bigger, but then ya gotta take the old cage out with the murder monster in it.

topics.body: And another thing about Jurassic World I really REALLY liked. Whenever they refer to Indominus the characters almost always use female pronouns. Always rsaying "she" and "her." They rarely ever call Indominus an "it."

I'm saying they didn't think she'd grow that fast.
